extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Parallel Computing in distributed computing and Subunit formations in Kpop have Divide and Conquer

parallel_computing.purpose: Breaking down a complex problem into smaller, more manageable parts that can be solved independently or simultaneously.
parallel_computing.mechanism: Divide the task into smaller sub-tasks that can be processed in parallel by multiple units, optimizing efficiency and speed.

subunit_formations.purpose: Dividing a larger music group into smaller subunits that focus on specific concepts, styles, or genres within the group's overall identity.
subunit_formations.mechanism: Creating specialized subunits within the group allows each unit to maximize its strengths and talents, enhancing creativity and audience engagement.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Parallel Computing in distributed computing and Subunit formations in Kpop have Parallel Processing

parallel_computing.purpose: Harnessing the combined power of multiple processors to work on different parts of a problem concurrently, leading to faster computation.
parallel_computing.mechanism: Allocating tasks to various processors that work simultaneously on different aspects of the problem, leading to improved performance and reduced processing time.

subunit_formations.purpose: Utilizing the diverse talents and skills of individual members within subunits to create distinct performances within the larger group.
subunit_formations.mechanism: Allowing subunits to operate concurrently on their unique music or performance styles within the group, offering variety and depth to the overall group's output.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Parallel Computing in distributed computing and Subunit formations in Kpop have Collaborative Engineering

parallel_computing.purpose: Encouraging specialists in different areas to work together, each handling a specific portion of the project to expedite the design and development process.
parallel_computing.mechanism: Teams of experts collaborate on distinct components of a project, combining their expertise to achieve complex objectives efficiently.

subunit_formations.purpose: Bringing together members with diverse skills and strengths to enhance the group's overall performance and creativity.
subunit_formations.mechanism: Encouraging collaboration among subunit members who contribute their unique abilities to create innovative music or performances, enriching the group's artistic output.
